workers.commandLine: python $rootdir/train.py $rootdir/$datadir -s src -t tgt --max-tokens 4000 -a $arch --share-all-embeddings --dropout 0.3084706935280793 --optimizer adam --adam-betas '(0.9, 0.98)' --clip-norm 0.07384482093397138 --weight-decay 0.0003626334483788909 --lr 0.0008945478716836286 --lr-scheduler cosine --warmup-init-lr 1e-7 --warmup-updates 47434 --max-lr 0.0004226551828781076 --min-lr 1e-09 --t-mult 0.19079026132411447 --criterion label_smoothed_cross_entropy --label-smoothing 0.1277313072802094 --max-update 350000 --max-epoch 10 --save-dir $PHILLY_JOB_DIRECTORY --tensorboard-logdir $PHILLY_SCRATCH_DIRECTORY
